game.name: Star Shift Freelancers
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In a galaxy where loyalty is tested and alliances shift like stars, Captain Max Triton and his crew find themselves embroiled in a sea of treachery. When their own government betrays them, Triton and his crew must forge their own path, or lose everything.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In a galaxy where loyalty is tested and alliances shift like stars, Captain Max Triton and his crew find themselves embroiled in a sea of treachery. When their own government betrays them, Triton and his crew must forge their own path, or lose everything.
